short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily learn the name of the color you click on. Useful for colorblinds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension, you can tell what color is a selected pixel is. The aim of the extension is to help colorblind people. Only very basic colors are provided, and you can go for even smaller color sets.

Source: https://github.com/FKLC/WhatColorIsThis
